step.name: getBatchDate
step.sql: SELECT startTime, endTime FROM ( SELECT '2018-01-01' startTime, DATE_ADD( DATE_FORMAT('20180101', '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL rownum - 1 DAY ) endTime FROM ( SELECT @rownum :=@rownum + 1 AS rownum FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0) r, bis_shop_loginlog ) t0 WHERE rownum < 200 ) t1 WHERE endTime <= '2018-06-28' ORDER BY endTime

step.name: 表输入
step.sql: SELECT job_id, job_name, job_status, create_time, update_time, update_staff FROM kettle_etl_job_log WHERE log_id > ${log_id}

step.name: 表输入
step.sql: SELECT log_id, job_id, job_name, job_status, create_time, update_time, update_staff FROM kettle_etl_job_log

step.name: getNowSeq
step.sql: SELECT job_id, param_value start_seq FROM kettle_etl_job_param WHERE job_id = ${job_id} AND param_key = 'start_seq'

step.name: kettle_etl_job_log
step.sql: SELECT log_id start_seq, ${job_id} job_id, '${job_nm}' job_name, '1' job_status, now() create_time, now() update_time, 'agile.q' update_staff FROM kettle_etl_job_log t1 WHERE t1.log_id > ${start_seq} order by log_id limit ${limit_nm}

step.name: 数据库连接
step.sql: select job_name,job_type,job_flag from kettle_etl_job where job_id=?

step.name: getCdcParam
step.sql: SELECT distinct case when '${table_nm}' is null or '${table_nm}'='' then CONCAT( t.TABLE_SCHEMA, '.', t.TABLE_NAME )else '${table_nm}' end V_TABLENAME, '${start_tm}' V_START_TM, '${end_tm}' V_END_TM, ${delete_nm} V_DELETE_NUM, ${save_day} V_SAVE_DAY FROM information_schema.`TABLES` t WHERE t.TABLE_SCHEMA IN ('bms') and t.TABLE_NAME LIKE '%loginlog%'

step.name: get_monitor_alarm_date
step.sql: select a.job_id, case a.job_id when 9 then 'tf_evt_cps_stl_order_up' when 10 then 'bdca.tf_evt_cps_txn_ctl_up' when 30 then 'maspos.t_txn_ctrl' when 31 then 'maspos.t_stl_list' when 32 then 'maspos.t_clr_txn_list' when 33 then 'maspos.t_clr_txn_list_leg' when 34 then 'tf_evt_cps_clr_list_up' when 35 then 'tf_evt_cps_stl_list_up' when 36 then 'tf_evt_cps_txn_ctl_up' when 90 then 'tf_evt_ate_transaction_flowing_up' when 114 then 'tf_evt_acc_order_master_up' end job_nm, case a.job_id when 9 then 'maspos.t_stl_order_cdc' when 10 then 'maspos.t_txn_ctrl_cdc' when 30 then 'maspos.t_txn_ctrl_cdc' when 31 then 'maspos.t_stl_list_cdc' when 32 then 'maspos.t_clr_txn_list_cdc' when 33 then 'maspos.t_clr_txn_list_leg_cdc' when 34 then 'maspos.t_clr_txn_list_cdc' when 35 then 'maspos.t_stl_list_cdc' when 36 then 'maspos.t_txn_ctrl_cdc' when 90 then 'acctpay.ate_transaction_flowing_cdc' when 114 then 'acctpay.t_acc_order_master_cdc' end job_yb, a.parm_val job_max_seq from ods.tp_c_etl_job_parm a where a.job_id in (9,10,30, 31, 32, 33, 34, 35, 36, 90, 114) and a.parm_key = 'header_change_seq'

step.name: get_storedb_alarm_info
step.sql: SELECT '${send_user_name}' send_user_name, '${send_user_addr}' send_user_addr, '${username}' username, '${password}' password, '${reciver_user_addr}' reciver_user_addr, '${copy_user_addr}' copy_user_addr, '${smtp_server}' smtp_server, '${smtp_port}' smtp_port, ${var_job_id} jobId, '${var_job_nm}' jobNm, '${var_job_yb}' jobYb, '${var_job_max_seq}' jobMaxSeq, ${job_threshold} jobThreshold, sysdate CurrentDate, max(header_timestamp) jobMaxDate FROM ${var_job_yb} where header_change_seq = '${var_job_max_seq}'

step.name: get_storedb_alarm_info 2
step.sql: select ${var_job_id} jobId, max(header_timestamp) jobCurrentDate from ${var_job_yb} where header_change_seq = (select max(header_change_seq) from ${var_job_yb})

jsScript.jsScript_script:
var monitor_appendix=JOBID+'_'+JOBNM+'.txt'; var monitor_main='新版UBP数据同步延迟告警'; var monitor_alarm_subject='Hi All:
' +'
ODS重点业务数据同步监控详情：' +'
监控开始时间='+CURRENTDATE +'
' +'
1、MYCAT_UBP数据同步延迟详情如下：' +'
监控作业编号='+JOBID +'
监控作业名称='+JOBNM +'
监控作业源表='+JOBYB +'
监控作业seq='+JOBMAXSEQ +'
监控作业最大时间='+JOBMAXDATE +'
监控作业当前时间='+JOBCURRENTDATE +'
监控作业延迟阀值='+JOBTHRESHOLD+'s' +'
监控同步延迟时间='+JOB_YCSJ+'s';

step.name: 表输入
step.sql: SELECT id,gif FROM test_jpg where gif is not null
